name: genaigo
description: GenAI Go - Email Integration & AI Analysis Platform

scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd backend && python -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload" "cd frontend && npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5173"
scripts.setup: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup:dev: cd backend && pip install -r ../requirements-dev.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: GenAI Go Team
